patch:
@@ -32841,6 +32841,11 @@ USA
                 <token>auto</token>
                 <token postag="VB.*" postag_regexp="yes" />
             </antipattern>
+            <antipattern><!-- That all look the same -->
+                <token regexp="yes">that</token>
+                <token>all</token>
+                <token postag="VB.*" postag_regexp="yes" />
+            </antipattern>
             <antipattern><!-- This error and this fail are the reason ... -->
                 <token postag="NN.*" postag_regexp="yes" />
                 <token regexp="yes">&|and|n?or</token>
@@ -33065,6 +33070,7 @@ USA
                 <example>This boy and this girl are very clean.</example><!-- Premium #1795 -->
                 <example>... and security dollars, and that if Obey is unsuccessful in committee, he will that will be off the table.</example><!--  #4233 -->
                 <example>The question is how much damage does this do externally.</example>
+                <example>We sell houses that all look the same.</example>
            </rule>
         </rulegroup>
